securitygame

Class Attacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPickup.Attacker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blitzkrieg, BlitzkriegV2

    public abstract class Attacker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Attacker agent. The actions for the attacker in this game include attacking a node, super attacking a node, probing for security values of a node, probing for the point value of a node, probing number of connections, and probing for honey pots. All logic/equations/formulas/etc for how your attacker decides to select actions should be included in run()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attacker

        public Attacker(java.lang.String agentName,
        java.lang.String defenderName,
        java.lang.String graphName)
        Constructor. Parses Network stored in graphFile. Performs Attacker logic to select actions. Outputs [agentName]-[graphFile].attack with selected actions
        Parameters:
        agentName - Attacker agent's name i.e. "Sharks"
        defenderName - Defender agent's name i.e. "Jets"
        graphName - String containing number of visibility network i.e. "1914"
